thread.title: Cubs win gets most viewers in wild-card game's short history
thread.title_full: Cubs win gets most viewers in wild-card game's short history

title: Cubs win gets most viewers in wild-card game's short history
text:
> Sports Cubs win gets most viewers in wild-card game's short history Chicago Cubs' Kris Bryant, left, celebrates with teammates in their locker room after a 4-0 win over the Pittsburgh Pirates in the National League wild card baseball game Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh. The Cubs advance to face the St. Louis Cardinals in the National League Division Series. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar)
